description:
build a Recommendation System, recommending the items based on the following.
1. **Content Based Filtering**
2. **Collaborative Filtering**
- End result should be a system that.
1. Recommend posts for the given user
2. Recommend similar posts for the given post


### Content

There are 3 files.
| File | discretion|
| --- | --- |
| user_data.csv |Users dataset containing user's details like name, id, gender etc. |
| post_data.csv | Post dataset containing posts details like title category etc. |
| view_data.csv | Views dataset contains the mapping which user views which post(s) |

## Users Data

**userid** : unique alphanumeric id of the user (string). firstname: First Name of user (string)
**last_name** : Last Name of user (string)
**gender** : Gender of user (male | female)
**avatar** : user's avatar URL(string)
**city** : user's city(string)
**academics** : Education of the use (undergraduate | graduate)

## Posts Data

**post_id**: a unique id of the post (string)
**title**: Title of the post (string)
**category**: Category of the post (string)

## View Data

**user_id**: unique alphanumeric id of the user (string)
**post_id**: unique id of the post (string)
**time_stamp**: timestamp of when user viewed the post (ISO time format)
title: Post Recommendations Dataset
